Prepare list of all genes ...

```{r}
# Read in 450K annotation
ANNOT <- "/Users/mikhail/Documents/Work/GenomeRunner/Aging/Illumina/GPL13534-11288.txt.gz"
annot.cg <- read.table("/Users/mikhail/Documents/Work/GenomeRunner/Aging/Illumina/GPL13534-11288.txt.gz", sep = "\t", skip=37, header=T, stringsAsFactors = FALSE, fill = T)
# Select genes only
genes.cg <- annot.cg$UCSC_RefGene_Name[ annot.cg$UCSC_RefGene_Name != "" ]
genes.cg <- sapply(genes.cg, function(x) strsplit(x, ";")) %>% unlist %>% sort %>% unique %>% as.character
```

Prepare ADME gene lists ...

```{r}
ADME.core <- readLines("/Users/mikhail/Documents/Work/GenomeRunner/gwas2bed/genes/data/ADME_core.txt")
ADME.extended <- readLines("/Users/mikhail/Documents/Work/GenomeRunner/gwas2bed/genes/data/ADME_extended.txt")
ADME.related <- readLines("/Users/mikhail/Documents/Work/GenomeRunner/gwas2bed/genes/data/ADME_related.txt")
```

Prepare enrichment functions ...

```{r}
# Enrichment of genes in an ADME list
enrichment <- function(genes = genes, genes.cg = genes.cg, ADME = ADME.core) {
  # Prepare 2x2 contingency table
  Age.ADME <- length(intersect(genes, ADME))
  Age.notADME <- length(genes) - Age.ADME
  notAge.ADME <- setdiff(genes.cg, genes) %>% intersect(., ADME) %>% length
  notAge.notADME <- length(genes.cg) - notAge.ADME - length(genes)
  matrix.2x2 <- matrix(c(Age.ADME, Age.notADME, notAge.ADME, notAge.notADME), nrow = 2)
  # Precaution against zeros
  if (Age.ADME == 0) {
    return("Nothing significant")
  }
  return(fisher.test(matrix.2x2))
}

# Wrapper to print the results
enrichment.all <- function(genes = genes, genes.cg = genes.cg, ADME = ADME.core) {
  res <- enrichment(genes, genes.cg, ADME = ADME)
  if (class(res) == "character") {
    print(paste("Age genes do not contain", deparse(substitute(ADME)), "genes"))
  } else {
    print(paste(length(genes), "Age genes contain", length(intersect(genes, ADME)), deparse(substitute(ADME)), ifelse(res$estimate > 0, "enriched", "depleted"), "at Fisher's exact p-value", formatC(res$p.value, digits = 3, format = "e"), ifelse(res$p.value > 0.05, "not significant", "") ))
  }
}
```

```{r}

enrichment.all(genes, genes.cg, ADME.core)

enrichment.all(genes, genes.cg, ADME.related)
```
